price: Ga kõwace al'umma Mun sanya wurin yanka, su ne masu yin baiko gare Shi, sabõda haka, kada su yi maka jãyayya a cikin al'amarin (hadaya). Kuma ka yi kira zuwa ga Ubangijinka lalle kai kana a kan shiriya madaidaiciya.
arabic: لِّكُلِّ أُمَّةٖ جَعَلۡنَا مَنسَكًا هُمۡ نَاسِكُوهُۖ فَلَا يُنَٰزِعُنَّكَ فِي ٱلۡأَمۡرِۚ وَٱدۡعُ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَۖ إِنَّكَ لَعَلَىٰ هُدٗى مُّسۡتَقِيمٖ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: likulli ummatin jaʿalnā mansakan hum nāsikūhu falā yunāziʿunnaka fī al-amri wa-ud'ʿu ilā rabbika innaka laʿalā hudan mus'taqīmin
translations: So let them not dispute with you
So let them not dispute with you
